resources.string: Fayilo yokhala ndi dzina lomweli ilipo kale
Palibe Pulogalamu yomwe yapezeka yotsegula fayiloyi
Kuchotsa zinthu zomwe zili pansipa kuzichotseratu pachipangizo chanu ndipo sikungapezekenso.
Kodi mukufuna kukhazikitsa njira yaposachedwa ngati nyumba ya tabu iyi?
Maseti static icon color. Sikuchotsa zokonda zachithunzi cha chikwatu.
Pakuti mizu chipangizo kokha. Yang\'anani pokhapokha ngati mukutsimikiza za izo.
Onetsani Tizithunzi za mapulogalamu ndi zithunzi
Onetsani Tsiku Lomaliza ndi Zosinthidwa Nthawi
Onetsani kukula kwa mafayilo ndi kuchuluka kwa zinthu zomwe zili mumafoda
Onetsani Zilolezo za Mafayilo ndi Mafoda
Muli ndi zosintha zosasungidwa, kodi mukufuna kuzisunga musanatuluke?
Uwu ndi nkhokwe. Kodi mukufuna kuchita chiyani?
Ichi ndi chokhazikitsa phukusi. Kodi mukufuna kuchita chiyani?
Gwiritsani ntchito zithunzi ndi makanema ozungulira
Imayatsa kusakatula mobwereza mwamakonda pamwamba pamndandanda
Iyi ndi pulogalamu yamakina, kuichotsa kungayambitse kusakhazikika kwadongosolo .\nPitilizani?
Mafayilo osunga zakale azitsitsidwa kufodayi. Mtengo wotsikirapo ndi chikwatu chomwe zosungidwazo zilimo.
Mukangoyamba, chikwatu chomwe chawonedwa posachedwa pa tabu iliyonse chidzawonetsedwa
Kaya cholozera chadongosolo chili ndi utoto kapena ayi
Khazikitsani mtundu ku zigawo zosiyanasiyana za UI
Khazikitsani mtundu kukhala zinthu zazikulu za UI pa tabu yakumanzere
Sungani mtundu ku FAB ndi zinthu zina zazing\'ono za UI
\kuti mupereke mwayi wolembera kuti mugwiritse ntchito
Pulogalamu ikufunika chilolezo chosungira kuti ipitilize. Kuletsa kukambiranaku kudzatuluka mu pulogalamuyi.
Sakani pogwiritsa ntchito mawu okhazikika a BASH
Ngati yakhazikitsidwa, mawu okhazikika adzafanana ndi dzina lonse lafayilo, idzayang\'ana zomwe zingachitike mwanjira ina.
Sungani mtundu kukhala zinthu zazikulu za UI pagawo loyenera
I ID ya PayPal koperedwa pa bolodi

Momwe mungapezere chikwatu cha Windows chogawana pa Android (SMB)


Yambitsani Kugawana Fayilo pa Windows

Tsegulani Control Panel, dinani Sankhani HomeGroup ndi Kugawana zosankha pansi pa Network ndi intaneti, ndikudina "Sinthani Zikhazikiko Zakugawana Mwaukadaulo," yambitsani "Fayilo ndi Chigawo cha Printer Sharing".


Zokonda Zowonjezera Zogawana Mafayilo

Mungafunenso kukonza zokonda zogawana apa. 
 Mwachitsanzo, mutha kulowetsa mafayilo anu popanda mawu achinsinsi ngati mumakhulupirira zonse zida pamanetiweki kwanuko. Kugawana mafayilo ndi chosindikizira kukayatsidwa, mutha tsegulani File Explorer kapena Windows Explorer, dinani kumanja chikwatu chomwe mukufuna kugawana, ndi sankhani Properties. 
 Dinani batani la Gawani ndi kupanga chikwatu kupezeka pa netiweki.


Onetsetsani kuti zida zonse zili pa Wifi imodzi

Izi zimapangitsa kuti mafayilo azipezeka pa netiweki yakomweko, kotero PC yanu ndi zida zam'manja akuyenera kukhala pa netiweki ya komweko. Simungathe kupeza chikwatu chogawidwa cha Windows pa intaneti kapena foni yanu ikalumikizidwa ndi data yake yam'manja - izo ikuyenera kulumikizidwa ku Wi-Fi.


Pezani adilesi ya IP

Tsegulani Command Prompt. Lembani 'ipconfig' ndikusindikiza Enter. Yang'anani Default Gateway pansi pa adaputala yanu ya netiweki ya adilesi ya IP ya rauta yanu. Yang'anani \"IPv4 Address\" pansi pa gawo la adaputala lomweli kuti mupeze IP ya kompyuta yanu adilesi.


Lowetsani zambiri mu bokosi la zokambirana la SMB
Sankhani mizu ya chipangizo cha OTG
Mufunika kukopera fayiloyi kumalo osungirako kuti mutsegule
Khalani mawu achinsinsi ofunika kubisa. Siyani chopanda kanthu kuti muchotse.
Gwiritsani ntchito zala zanu kuti mutsimikizire kubisa
Zilolezo za zilolezo za zala zilibe
Kulangizidwa, mukasintha ndondomeko yanu yachitetezo kuchokera Zokonda pamakina, simungathe kubisa mawuwa.
Amaze Cloud pulagi sinapezeke. Chonde tsitsani kuchokera ku Play Store.
Zakanika kutsegula. Chonde tsegulani Amaze Cloud kamodzi.
Ikutha pa kukumbukira, chonde chotsani RAM
Sikanika kuwonjezera kulumikizidwa kwa Mtambo kwatsopano
Vuto polandira adilesi ya inet yapafupi
Kanizani njira zazitali kuti mulembe njira yanu
Imakulolani kuti mutsegule mafayilo muzochita zosiyana. Zipezeni kuchokera pa zenera laposachedwapa.
Chonde ikani pulogalamu ya Bitcoin Wallet
Zidziwitso za Amaze File Manager\'s Notifications
Amaze Fayilo Zidziwitso za Seva ya FTP\'s
Zakanika kutsegula mafayilo. Chonde onani kulumikizana kwanu.

Zowona za wolandila '%1$s' sizingatsimikizike.

%2$s chinsinsi chala ndi %3$s.

Chonde dinani "Inde" kuti mutsimikizire kudziwika; mwinamwake, chonde dinani "Ayi".
Kulephera kwa logon: Kulephera kutsimikizira dzina lolowera ndi mawu achinsinsi omwe mwaperekedwa.
Kulephera kwa logon: Sizinatheke kutsimikizira dzina lolowera ndi kiyi yachinsinsi.

NDIKUTHEKA KUTI ENA AKUCHITA ZINTHU ZOSANGALATSA!

Wina atha kukumvani nanu! pompano (man-in-the-middle attack)! Ndizothekanso kuti kiyi yolandila yasinthidwa kumene. Chidindo chala chala cha kiyi ya anthu onse yotumizidwa ndi wolandila zakutali sichikufanana ndi zomwe zasungidwa mu Amaze.

Chonde funsani ndi woyang'anira makina anu kapena khazikitsani cholumikizira chatsopano kuti mupitilize kulumikiza ku seva.
Kupanga njira zazifupi sikutheka ndi choyambitsa chanu.
Ndibwino kugwiritsa ntchito \".zip\" monga fayilo yowonjezera.
Ndibwino kugwiritsa ntchito \".txt\" monga chiwonjezero cha fayilo.
Palibe decoder yovomerezeka kuti imasulire PEM.
Simungathe, chonde tsegulaninso kuchokera pa pulogalamu yomaliza
China chake chalakwika, palibe choti mutsegule
The Fayilo ndi yayitali kwambiri ndipo silingasinthidwe, komabe mutha kuwerenga zilembo %d zoyambilira
Gwiritsani Ntchito Mawonekedwe A Amaze Encryption

AESCrypt ndi mawonekedwe otsegulira mafayilo otseguka potengera kubisa kwa AES. Itha kunyamulanso, imatha kusindikizidwa ndi mapulogalamu a AESCrypt pamapulatifomu ena.

tsamba la AESCrypt

Amaze\'s Encryption Format imakhazikitsidwanso ndi kubisa kwa AES; koma mosiyana ndi mtundu wa AESCrypt, ukhoza kusinthidwa ndi chipangizochi; komanso simuyenera kuchotsa Amaze File Manager pachipangizochi kapena kusintha momwe mumatsekera sikirini, apo ayi simudzakhala ndi njira yopezera fayilo yobisidwa.
Mafayilo obisidwa akuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito \".aze\" ngati chiwonjezero cha fayilo.
Mafayilo obisika akuyenera kugwiritsa ntchito \".aes\" ngati chiwongolero cha mafayilo.
Fayilo yomwe yapangidwa ibisika mundandanda wamafayilo.
Pulogalamu ikufunika chilolezo kuti iike mapulogalamu apitirire.
Mafayilo ena munkhokwe sangathe kuchotsedwa; zolemba zakale zitha kuonongeka kapena zachokera ku malo oyipa.
Mukupita kumafayilo a Android pazifukwa zachitetezo. Chonde sankhani chipangizo cha USB pamndandanda womwe uli kumanzere.
Zikomo chifukwa cha zoperekazi, izi zimatilimbikitsa! (:
Yambitsani zotsatira za mayina a mafayilo
Sitingathe Tsegulani zakale \"%s\". Sitingatsegule zosungira, kapena zosungidwazo zidawonongeka.
Mafayilo ena alephera chifukwa chosalondola opareshoni
Lumikizani ku netiweki kapena kuyatsa AP
Nenani za vutoli kudzera pa imelo
Nenani za vutoli kudzera pa telegalamu
Chonde onani ngati vuto lomwe likukambirana za kuwonongeka kwanu lilipo kale.
Zimitsani cheke cha kusaina kwa IPC (Pamaseva amtundu wa SMBv1 - UNSAFE!)
Gwiritsani ntchito mindandanda yacholowa pa mizu
Ngati yayatsidwa, imagwiritsa ntchito njira yalegacy kulemba mafayilo
RAR archive \"%s\" ndi malo osungirako zakale a RAR v5.
Mufunika kuyambitsanso FTP seva kuti zosintha zichitike.
Gwirani ndi kukokera kuti musunthe kapena kukopera mafayilo
Gwirani ndi kukokera kuti musankhe mafayilo
Perekani mwayi kwa SAF pa seva ya FTP

Popeza aka ndiye kuthamanga kwanu koyamba kwa seva ya FTP, ndipo mukugwiritsa ntchito posungira mkati mwa chipangizocho ngati chikwatu chogawana, chonde lolani Amaze kuti azitha kugwiritsa ntchito SAF.\n\n
Muyenera kuchita izi kamodzi kokha, mpaka nthawi ina mukadzasankhanso malo atsopano oti mugawane nawo.

Popeza Android 10, Android idakhazikitsa ziletso pamakanema ena, ndipo akuyenera kulowa ndi Storage Access Framework.\n \nChonde lolani Amaze kuti azitha kupeza chikwatu kuchokera kwa woyang\'anira mafayilo adongosolo podina \"Lolani Kufikira\".
Yambitsani Izi zothandizira kugwiritsa ntchito malo osungira kunja kwa chipangizo pamitundu yatsopano ya Android

Seva ya FTP yomwe adagawana njira idasinthidwa kukhala yosungirako mkati pamene mukubwerera ku kukhazikitsa mafayilo omwe adatengera kale. Chonde sankhani njira yatsopano pogwiritsa ntchito menyu yomwe ili kumanja komwe kuli koyenera.
Njira yogawana nawo seva ya FTP yasinthidwa kukhala yosungirako mkati
Mukusankha njira yomwe ikufuna kulowa muzu. Chonde yambitsani root Explorer muzokonda ngati chipangizo chanu chazikika.

Mukusankha njira yomwe imafuna kulowa muzu, yomwe imakuthandizani kuti muzitha kuwerenga/kulemba pamafayilo anu onse pachipangizo chanu, ndipo ndiyowopsa - kulakwitsa mosasamala kukhoza kutsekereza chipangizo chanu!\n\nMukutsimikiza?
\"%s\" ndi zakale zovunditsidwa.\nUthenga wochokera ku extractor: \"%s\"
Fayilo sinathe kutsegulidwa pogwiritsa ntchito pulogalamuyi
Pangani kulumikizana ndi Google Drive™ poyang\'anira mafayilo mkati mwa Amaze File Manager.
Zolakwika potenga mndandanda wazogulitsa kuchokera ku Google Play.

Kuyambira Android 11 , Google imapempha File Managers kuti apemphe chilolezo cha ogwiritsa ntchito kuyang'anira mafayilo onse pachipangizocho. Tsatanetsatane apa. 

Amaze File Manager ikufunikanso chilolezo. Mukakanikiza "Perekani"apa, chonde sankhani Lolani mwayi wowongolera mafayilo onse pazenera lotsatira. 

Kuletsa kukambiranaku kudzatuluka mu pulogalamuyi.
Sinthani mokonda mutu, mitundu ndi maonekedwe a woyang’anira mafayilo
Sinthani zomwe mungawonetse, sinthani makonda am\'mbali, ndikusintha zokonda za UI
Sinthani machitidwe monga kusaka kwapamwamba komanso ngati mungatsegule mafayilo ngati ntchito yatsopano
Mafayilo zomwe zapezeka posachedwa kudzera pa Amaze

Mukutumizidwa ku Amaze File Utilities. Ndi pulogalamu yathu yotsegula yomwe ili ndi zowonera zojambulidwa, makanema, zithunzi/zolemba, imakupatsani mwayi wosanthula mafayilo osafunikira kuti muthe kusunga, kutumiza mwachangu pogwiritsa ntchito Wifi P2P ndi zina zambiri.\nChonde tithandizeni poyesera.
Zikomo poika Amaze File Utilities. Mukutumiziridwanso ku pulogalamuyi.
Gawani mitengo yojambulidwa kudzera pa imelo / telegalamu
Malinga ndi malamulo a Google Play, mapulogalamu saloledwa kudzisintha okha. Chonde sinthani pulogalamu kuchokera ku Google Play.
Sitinathe kupeza zambiri za phukusi kuchokera mufayilo \"%s\". Fayilo yomwe mwasankhayo si APK, kapena fayiloyo ndi yachinyengo.
Pemphani kuti mutsimikizire musanachotse mafayilo. Kuyimitsa izi sikukhumudwitsidwa kwambiri!
Kutumiza kunja kwalephera: sikunathe kulemba fayilo yosunga zobwezeretsera
Kuitanitsa kunalephera: sinathe kuwerenga zosunga zobwezeretsera. file
Amaze Cloud Plugin sikugwira ntchito ndi mtundu wa F-Droid. Chonde gwiritsani ntchito mtundu wa Play Store wa Amaze.
Imaletsa osewerera a Amaze inbuilt media kuchokera pa kusankha mafayilo
Palibe pulogalamu yomwe yapezeka kuti ikuthandizeni. Kodi mwayika DocumentsUI?

Tsoka ilo, sitinathe kusamutsira ziyeneretso za kulumikizana kwanu mumtambo kupita kumalo atsopano a database, ndipo tinali ndi kuti muwachotse mu pulogalamuyi. Chonde panganinso kulumikizana kwamtambo.
